data.text: Thanks for John and Shova to assist me he /she is polite and friendly...Great service and nice staying this hotel . i recommended this hotel. hopefully i will back again, thank for all. Near supermarket, tram staion,dubai marina and etc. enjoy staying
data.title: Nice Staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Anum Khan,

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your valuable feedback.

It gives us great pleasure to know that you enjoyed staying in the hotel and that you are happy with our hotel and services. We highly value your opinion and I thank you sincerely for the time taken to share your comments. I will personally extend your kind words to John and Shova who will be as happy to hear about your experience as I am.

I hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to Tamani Marina Hotel in the future. 

Sincerely,

Walid Al Awa
General Manager
owner_response.author: Walid Alawa

data.text: great stay in Tamani Hotel I booked single room happy to free upgrade the room. very fantastic room and I will amaze because very huge and spacious room. I will back soon again. Thank to John being kind and polite he always helping want I need..
data.title: happy and satisfied

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Roman,

I sincerely appreciate your valuable time for sharing your feedback with us during your stay at TAMANI Marina Hotel.

We greatly appreciate your comments made by our valuable guests and we always strive to achieve the highest level of service. We are glad that you have enjoyed staying in the hotel and service, which we do take pride in. Your detailed feedback was truly inspiring for the team, particularly John, who displayed a great amount of professionalism and warm hospitality, providing you with a great experience.

On behalf of the entire team, we look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back at TAMANI Marina Hotel.

Sincerely,

Walid Al Awa 
General Manager
owner_response.author: Walid Alawa

data.text:
Amazing hotel and nice atmosphere
I want to thank the hotel staff,  specially Rejith and Abhilash,I think this hotel is one of the best hotels in Dubai with excellent location near the sea, access to the subway and close to the marina with excellent view and polite staff.
data.title: Amazing hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

Thank you for choosing Tamani Marina Hotel, and thank you for taking the time to provide us with your valued feedback it is always highly appreciated.

It is delightful to know that you have enjoyed your stay with us and we are very proud that our team continuously goes above and beyond to ensure that we create everlasting memories for our guests.

Your detailed feedback was truly inspiring for the team, particularly Rejith and Abhilash who displayed a great amount of professionalism and warm hospitality, providing you with a great experience.

Once again, thank you for sharing your experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

data.text:
Dear hotel staff,
I would like to express my deep gratitude for the extraordinary experience I had during my stay. Your attention to detail, warm hospitality and professionalism have greatly contributed to making my stay unforgettable.
In particular, I would like to thank John and Abdo from the bottom of my heart. Their dedication, respect and the quality of their service were remarkable. They are exceptional individuals who really enriched my stay. Their admirable work and kindness will forever remain engraved in my memories.
Once again, a big thank you to the whole team for making my stay so memorable. I will never forget the warm welcome and exceptional attention I have received.
data.title: Absolute Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued Guest, 

Thank you very much for choosing to stay at Tamani Marina Hotel and for taking the time to share your comments with us. 

We greatly appreciate any comments made by our valuable guests and we always strive to achieve the highest level of service. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed hotel and its facilities and that your overall experience was good. 

Thank you for recognizing our colleagues, John & Abdo, who impressed you by their attention and professionalism. It is always with pride that I am able to personally recognize them for their efforts to exceed our guest's expectations and provide a truly personalized service on all occasions. 

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back at Tamani Marina Hotel and looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely, 

Walid Al Awa 
General Manager
owner_response.author: Walid Alawa

data.text:
Amazing value - the hotel is just outside the marina area and  right next to the tram station. Service at the hotel (room cleaning, restaurant etc) is fantastic - Rejith at the bfst restaurant managed 15 tables all by himself and still provided personalized service!  Amazing marina garden restaurant next door wt Indian, Chinese, American cuisine.  Only -negatives are: 
1) single rooms are on the 3rd floor and it can get pretty noisy. 
2) The front desk staff seem a bit overwhelmed and could be a bit more welcoming at checkin
 Overall just a wonderful place.  I'll be back!
data.title: Great value at a convenient location!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

I sincerely appreciate your valuable time for sharing your feedback with us during your stay at TAMANI Marina Hotel.

We greatly appreciate your comments made by our valuable guests and we always strive to achieve the highest level of service. We are glad that you have enjoyed staying in the hotel and you enjoyed the hotel’s convenient location, specious rooms and service, which we do take pride in. Your detailed feedback was truly inspiring for the team, particularly Rejith who displayed a great amount of professionalism and warm hospitality, providing you with an authentic experience.

On behalf of the entire team, we look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back at TAMANI Marina Hotel.

Sincerely,

Walid Al Awa 
General Manager
